website_summaries.verdict: Powerful 20-Watt speaker capable of connectivity with up to 8 other speakers for "house party" sound.
pros: Can be used to connect up to 8 speakers throughout your home to fill all rooms with sound
Utilizes a 5.8 GHz radio frequency, so no need to connect to home WiFi
Can be used anywhere, and they work with any music streaming app
Connect via Bluetooth for up to 9 hours play time
Universal controls allows playing options for all connected speakers
cons: Some purchasers had issues with connectivity and range limitations, when syncing other speakers

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to keep them synced and all three working
customer_reviews.text: We initially liked these because the sound quality was good. However, we have had nothing but problems with them. They won't stay connected and no matter what we do, we usually can only have one working. We reset them, do everything the book says and they won't sync. Would never buy them again and would recommend others not t o buy them. If you are going to be spending this much on speakers you shouldn't have this much frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Block Party is a Great Bluetooth speaker that gives great sound for it's size
customer_reviews.text: The Block Party is a Great Bluetooth speaker that gives great sound for it's size. It has a lot more bass than the "House Party" version. The one thing that I found to be a bit challenging at times is the syncing to another speaker. The range varied depending on the surroundings, but for some reason found that the "Block Party" speaker did a better job at being the main sharing speaker than the "House Party".
customer_reviews.author: TurtleThumper

customer_reviews.title: Can not recommend - Bluetooth won’t stay connected.
customer_reviews.text: If it weren’t for the Bluetooth not staying connected, this would be a decent speaker. But sitting listening to music with the phone and the speaker 6’ apart and not moving - the Bluetooth connection drops (‘Bluetooth out of range’), stops the song and then, after 30 seconds, reconnect (‘Bluetooth connected’) - and I have to restart the song. For no reason. And repeatedly. So frustrating - completely ruins the whole listening experience. Can not recommend this speaker for this specific reason.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed of the sound that comes from this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speaker lasted indoors for only 5 months: I'm amazed of the sound that comes from this speaker. I read many reviews and bought two of these. Linked them up together and wowza! One single speaker was really great sound with subwoofer but two was outstanding. PRODUCT UPDATE: Bought in December and it stop working on May. The speaker did not last long at all. Too late to return. Not happy that it did not even last a year. It sounded great while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: The house party is a good Bluetooth speaker that gives above average sound for it's size. It lacks the bass of the "Block Party" version, but sound quality is still good. The one thing that I found to be a bit challenging at times is the syncing to another speaker. The range varied depending on the surroundings, but for some reason found that the "Block Party" speaker did a better job at being the main sharing speaker than the "House Party".
customer_reviews.author: TurtleThumper

customer_reviews.title: "Out of Range" error with TV.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker would not maintain connection to my Samsung smart TV. Shortly after connecting, it would give the "out of range" error. No other bluetooth device I own has this problem, and proximity to the TV did not matter. It was able to connect to other devices OK, but I purchased it specificlaly for use with that TV. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: This is going to make the Sono's groupies Mad.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. It has enough oomph and power to easily be heard outdoors. There are two settings for the speaker, one for indoors, one for outdoors. Change the setting to the outdoors mode regardless of where you are using it. It just sounds better. Very little distortion even at very high sound levels. We have parties all the time around the pool and this is a MUST HAVE item. I haven't bought another speaker yet to link to, but that is in the plans.
customer_reviews.author: rcc-GTO

customer_reviews.title: Put 2 in my '40 Chevy
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these in my old pickup. Great sound from a 5 inch cube. Don't expect big bass in this sized unit. Best feature is ease of connectivity. This thing actually Wants to connect to your phone, rather than making u jump thru signin hoops like many bluetooth devices seem to do. Coolest feature is when you kill the power by pressing a button on the main unit and it powers down the remote unit(s). No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: SFVS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing totally rocks. I work in a machine shop and use it there and it's not only loud but has a big robust sound you would expect from large speakers. The amplifier is very competent also providing plenty of punch.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a compact package - Yes!
customer_reviews.text: We're very pleased with the Block Party cube bluetooth speaker. The sound quality and accuracy are quite nice for such a small package. The sound fills a room even at low volume levels. Coupled the cube with a set of JLab high-end bluetooth earbuds. A great package.
customer_reviews.author: dmai

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the block party and 1 house party....great speakers! The sound is clear even at the loudest they turn up to.....cant wait to use them outside in the backyard for picnics!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best buy on the market right now. Bought 2 of them and linked them together. It tripled the sound to the ear. Awesome speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended due to gliches!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 5 months and it doesnt work anymore.. wont connect to bluetooth! So Frusterating!!
customer_reviews.author: Dill

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to all blue tooth speakers only like ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to connect several different speakers only to find it only connects to ones in their own family of products. Limited other products (not available). I re-read the listing and still found it vague. Don't buy it unless you want to make further investments.
customer_reviews.author: TonyM

customer_reviews.title: The sound is excellent. Bluetooth is easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a big punch! The sound is excellent and very dynamic. It syncs very easy with bluetooth. I cannot say enough good things about this. The sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Pope

customer_reviews.title: Straght garbage!!!!!!!!!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Good but when the battery is low he tells you every ten seconds. I was listening while in the tub and could plug it in right away so it was pretty annoying. Ended up turning it off. Other than that it's small super portable good sound. And the battery lasted about a day maybe a little more of playing music almost constantly. Edit: May 11th 2018 It wont charge. Thought it was my outlet. Nope. Thought it was my cord. Nope. I barely used this damn speaker and it allready took a crap. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds fine, though not as good as I'd expected...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fine, though not as good as I'd expected based on the reviews. Bass response is lacking, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: ZD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked briefly. Says "out of range" when it's next to the device it's paired with. Very sad it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BETH PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this...This is surprisingly loud. I'm so glad I waited for the block party but I will be purchasing the other units.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at this price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for a gift, and after hearing it play decided I had to have, too. Great sound at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality speaker for price! We have been using it for outdoor movies but plan to get another or for our beach house. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and has great sound whether played soft or loud
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and has great sound whether played soft or loud. The family started dancing as soon as it was paired, and didn't stop for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently listening to Misty! Beautiful sound filling the room!!
customer_reviews.author: G.Architect

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to set up with House Party speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Just got this after replacing my long time Jambox wireless speaker and I’m most impressed. The sound quality is excellent and I’m pretty sure I’ll get another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works great good sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works great good sound for a small speaker. Only draw back is the recargable battery doesn't last more than 2.5 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to link multiple units for a good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, super easy to link multiple units together. They're small, light weight, and not busy looking to draw attention to themselves, which I like. Wish it had a bit stronger bass though.
customer_reviews.author: laurie p.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, but one of two failed within 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Love the concept and even bought two of them. One has failed after 8 months and no longer powers up or can be charged.
customer_reviews.author: James Walter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth signal cuts in & out after about 15 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Talley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome base, midrange, and treble.
customer_reviews.text: Best for the price. I compared with the Bose that cost $149.99. Bose is no where near JLab Audio Block. If I could I would give it a 6 STAR.
customer_reviews.author: Kazi Rasheedi

customer_reviews.title: I liked this SO much that I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I liked this SO much that I bought a second one. Easy to use, size is great, and it's powerful for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is loud and very clear. use it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is loud and very clear. use it with my tv with two more of the mini block party speakers and the sound is incredible. i have a yamaha sound bar that cost 10 times as much and prefer the Block Party speakers.
customer_reviews.author: oldude

customer_reviews.title: Speaker burst less than 30 days.. I caught ...
customer_reviews.text: Speaker burst less than 30 days .. I caught hell trying to get in touch with someone , i still have not got it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! After researching and reading reviews of many systems, in a much higher price range, this one intrigued me. I'm so glad I decided to go with this one. The sound is fantastic, it's easy to operate and set up was a breeze. Spending a lot less money makes everyone happy and I feel the block party is of the same quality has the more expensive units.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: so you can place the speakers were ever you like. Only thing it's missing is it's not water ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a sufficient system for our house that didn't cost an arm and a leg. We had been told we should wire our house with speakers, which could cost $10k. Impressed with our new JLab Block Party Speaker. Can hook up to 8 speakers to your IPhone or computer. Also you can get up to 9 hours of power out of it until you need to recharge, so you can place the speakers were ever you like. Only thing it's missing is it's not water resistant. 50 watt speaker has bass, which a lot of the speakers of that size in the market place are missing.
customer_reviews.author: Penela

customer_reviews.title: A smart buying decision
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I chose this system! I reviewed many and in a much higher price range. After all the reviews I decided to give this one a try and I couldn't be happier. Easy set up, operation and great sound even at higher volumes. I feel the price is fantastic for this quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLUE TOOTH SPEAKER I HAVE EVER LISTENED
customer_reviews.text: Quick and simple. BEST BLUE TOOTH SPEAKER I HAVE EVER LISTENED. The range is a little better than advertised, which is also a good thing. Remember love thy neighbor
customer_reviews.author: chewy

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but it doesn't sound like it's 50 watts .
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: it is a big disappointment and I will be in touch with jlab Honk ...
customer_reviews.text: this product could struggle to have more volume than my iPhone.The battery after 12 hours of charge comes to just under 10 volts.it is a big disappointment and I will be in touch with jlab Honk Johnston Beaufort Victoria Australia
customer_reviews.author: honk johnston

product_meta.title: JLab Audio House Party Series Wireless Multi-Room Bluetooth Speaker | Connect 8 Speakers | Wireless Connectivity | Phone Control | 20 Watts | Black
feature_bullets: GO ROOM TO ROOM: Power your party with fully immersive, room-filling 3D Sound & Connect 8 Technology. The ultimate home sound system. No Wi-Fi, no wires, no apps needed to get your party started from room to patio.

CONNECT 8 TECHNOLOGY: Connect up to 8 speakers throughout your home. The Party Series will get your home rocking from room to patio with its own wireless system. Simply connect from your device via Bluetooth up to 30 ft away, then link all the speakers from up to 100 feet away for the ultimate sound experience.

WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Connect via Bluetooth and enjoy crisp surround sound for up to 9 full hours, giving you the freedom to place your Party Series speaker anywhere in between charges and not worry about pesky wires.

UNIVERSAL CONTROLS: Play & pause all speakers at once. Universal controls let you play in one room, pause in another. Adjust the volume manually on one single speaker or use your phone to change on all synced units. You can put the speakers to sleep then wake them up when you’re ready to rock. With sleep mode, your speakers will still hold a Bluetooth connection while being idle and plugged in. Wake one up, and they’ll all wake up leaving right from where you left off on your device.

TWO YEAR WARRANTY/30 DAY GUARANTEE: We are so sure you’ll be happy with your purchase that we offer a “30-Day Money-Back Guarantee” to ensure customer satisfaction of our JLab products. Also included with our products is a 2-year limited warranty to ensure you are covered for up to two years in case any issues with our products arise.
